item.title: Socioeconomic status in Malaysia
item.description: Economic status Malaysia is a multi-ethnic and multi-cultural country which is rich in natural resources like palm oil, timber and petroleum. In Malaysia, there is a total of 13 states and it is group by Peninsular Malaysia and East Malaysia. Vision 2020 is a Malaysia ideal introduced by the current prime minister of Malaysia, Dr.Tun Mahathir Mohamad. One of the nine challenges he outlined is “Ensuring an economically just society, in which there is a fair and equitable distribution of the wealth of the nation”.
